name: Birb
description:
Birb, a mechanical bird in a fantasy world, has to travel between floating islands. On the islands, there are ManPages the bird can collect. If it collects all ManPages of a level, a terminal can be accessed, in which a software upgrade can be done. Doing so upgrades the bird’s attributes, and the next level is loaded.

Birb wants to survive a whole day in order to rest.  In order to do so the mechanical bird has to complete multiple levels.

Made by Clemens, Daniel, Lorenz, Sebastian. For TUGameDev 2019.
